title: Ably Connections Client Event
description: A message sent on the clientEvents:connections metachannel describing a sampled client connection.

host.description: The host the connection was made to.

requestId.description: The unique ID of the request that Ably can use to correlate a connection event with internal logs, if necessary.

site.description: The site the connection was made to.

headers.description: The HTTP headers sent with the connection. Keys should be lower case.

query.description: The parsed query string of the connection request, excluding authentication parameters. It contains connection information such as the client library version and any custom transport parameters.

connectionId.description: The unique ID of the connection.

clientId.description: The ID of the client that attempted the connection.

channels.description: A list of channels included in the request. This is only relevant where channels are supported as part of the connection request, such as with SSE.

duration.description: The duration the connection was open for.

error.description: The details of any error encountered whilst making the connection request. It includes an error message, error code and HTTP status code.
